summary: This is the Third Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust One, executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein on February 6, 2004. It adds a provision to distribute $5,000,000 to Darren K. Indyke, or to his issue if he is not living, demonstrating a significant financial transfer from Epstein's trust to his associate.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: He is the grantor and amender of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust One, executing this third amendment to add a $5 million distribution to Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: He is named as the beneficiary to receive a $5,000,000 distribution from the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust One, as per this amendment.

connections.description: Epstein amended his trust to provide a $5 million distribution to Indyke, indicating a significant financial relationship.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein executed a Third Amendment to his 2001 Trust One on February 6, 2004.
The amendment added a provision to distribute $5,000,000 to Darren K. Indyke, or to his issue if he was not living.
This document demonstrates a direct and substantial financial transfer from Epstein's trust to his associate Darren K. Indyke.

Epstein had previously amended the trust on June 27, 2003 and December 3, 2004 (the latter date appears inconsistent with the execution date of this amendment, suggesting a possible typo or separate amendment).
The document is notarized, indicating its legal validity.
